entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:32 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 9:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -30.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: W 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
